dialog_need_account: We would like for you to complete your profile to interact with million of other people
dialog_interactions_done: We would like for you to complete your profile to interact with million of other people
dialog_terms: You must agree with our Terms of Use
dialog_flag_content: Your feedback es very important in helping us keep a safe community.
dialog_block: Are you sure you want to block this user?
dialog_block_content: We will no longer show you content from this user
error_password_length: Password must be at least 7 characters
label_preferences_subtitle: Just so you can have more fun!
label_signup_subtitle: Create a profile, follow other accounts, create your own polls and challenges!
label_login_subtitle: Manage your account, read your notifications, take part in polls, challenges and more
label_forgot: We'll send you an email to complete the password recovery process
label_flag: Why are you flagging this content?
onboarding_subtitle_1: ¡Vota por la opción de tu preferencia! REGALUPEA y comparte con tus amigos, apoya la causa que te mueve
onboarding_subtitle_2: ¡Lo que se te ocurra! La diversión está aquí, comparte, disfruta incluso puedes responder causas y mucho más!
onboarding_subtitle_3: Encuentra todo lo que te interesa de forma rápida. Usuarios, temas, encuestas, retos y mucho más en Galup
onboarding_subtitle_4: Chatea con cualquiera de tus seguidores, comparte en tiempo real toda la diversión que hay en Galup
onboarding_subtitle_5: Podrás tener tu propio perfil, con toda la información de encuestas y retos generados y guardados
